title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the RealTimeFraudDetectionNetwork system, considering scalability, real-time processing, and machine learning requirements.

title: Develop Machine Learning Algorithms
description: Create machine learning algorithms capable of detecting fraudulent activities in real-time across financial transactions.

title: Implement Real-Time Data Processing Pipeline
description: Develop a data processing pipeline that can handle real-time transaction data and feed it to the machine learning algorithms.

title: Create User Interface for Monitoring and Alerts
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface that allows administrators to monitor the system, set up alerts, and manage configuration.

title: Set Up Database and Data Storage Strategy
description: Choose appropriate databases and data storage solutions for the RealTimeFraudDetectionNetwork, ensuring high availability and performance.

title: Implement Security Measures and Compliance
description: Integrate security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with financial industry regulations.

title: Perform Integration Testing and Validation
description: Test the system as a whole to ensure all components work together seamlessly and meet the project's requirements.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Monitoring and Alerts
Set Up Database and Data Storage Strategy

title: Deploy and Configure the System in Production Environment
description: Deploy the system to a production environment, configure it, and ensure it's running smoothly.
